references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational concept of deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics, which is fundamental to diffusion models.
This is the seminal work introducing denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which provides the core theoretical framework for many advancements in the field.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper proposed a method of generative modeling through stochastic differential equations, which is crucial for efficient sampling in diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced progressive distillation for efficient sampling of diffusion models, a key technique for accelerating the inference process.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper introduced a hierarchical text-conditional image generation model, showing a significant advancement in text-to-image generation capabilities and influencing many subsequent works.
